attributes.action: Let pubs and restaurants reopen along side of all other retail and leisure
attributes.additional_details: Pubs and restaurants should re open immediately along side all other retail and entertainment venues and not use them as a scapegoat. There is no need to keep them closed when the environment in pubs is far more covid secure than most other establishments. Pubs are a thriving part of a community and benefit peoples health and well being. Sage has admitted itself that there is no need to keep pubs shut as it will make no difference apart from there will be little of the industry and unemployed
attributes.background: Pubs and restaurants should re open immediately along side all other retail and entertainment venues and not use them as a scapegoat

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow pubs and restaurants to operate without COVID-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325069

Change Tier 3 rules to allow pubs and restaurants to stay open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561917
